subject: Track and Field
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Gabriel Mvumvure of Louisiana State and Ngonidzashe Makusha of Florida State, from an unlikely home for sprinters, have run to the forefront of college track and field.
snippet: Gabriel Mvumvure of Louisiana State and Ngonidzashe Makusha of Florida State, from an unlikely home for sprinters, have run to the forefront of college track and field.
